data.title: Infinite polymeric frameworks consisting of three dimensionally linked rod-like segments

questions.question: What is the crystal system and space group of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
Based on the synthesis conditions, what was the unique method used for absorption corrections?
questions.answer: Numerically evaluated by Gaussian integration to a precision of 0.5% (SHELX-76).

questions.question: What was the final R value obtained after refinement for Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
How was the density of the crystals compared to nitrobenzene determined?
questions.answer: By noting that the density of the crystals appeared marginally greater than that of nitrobenzene.

questions.question: What was the maximum residual electron density found in the difference map for Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
What percentage of the unit cell volume is occupied by the nitrobenzene of solvation?
What was the method used to correct for Lorentz, polarization, and absorption effects?
questions.answer: The intensity data were corrected for Lorentz, polarization, and absorption effects; absorption corrections were numerically evaluated by Gaussian integration.

questions.question: Why were six reflections excluded from the analysis of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
questions.answer: Due to the lack of satisfactory agreement between their calculated and observed structures factors (AF > 5Ïƒ).

questions.question: How was the volume of a BF4- anion estimated?
questions.answer: By assuming it would occupy an approximately spherical volume with a radius close to the sum of the normal B-F covalent distance and the van der Waals radius of fluorine.

questions.question: What was the reason for the unsuccessful attempts to determine the density of the crystals by flotation?
questions.answer: Because of the rapid replacement of the nitrobenzene of solvation by the flotation medium.

questions.question: What was the primary challenge in the crystal structure determination of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
questions.answer: The crystals were relatively weakly scattering, but sufficient intensity data was available for atomic resolution.

questions.question: What led to the selection of the I4m2 space group for the structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
questions.answer: Only I4m2 yielded a solution for the structure when considering the five possible space groups.
